Package com.medilabosolutions.gateway.config

Class JwtAuthFilter

java.lang.Object
com.medilabosolutions.gateway.config.JwtAuthFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.core.Ordered, org.springframework.web.server.WebFilter
@Component public class JwtAuthFilter extends Object implements org.springframework.web.server.WebFilter, org.springframework.core.Ordered
WebFilter that processes JWT authentication from cookies. Extracts and validates JWT tokens, then sets up Spring Security context for authenticated users. Redirects to login page when token is invalid.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • filter

      public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void> filter(org.springframework.web.server.ServerWebExchange exchange, org.springframework.web.server.WebFilterChain chain)
      Filters incoming requests to check for valid JWT tokens in cookies. If valid token found, sets up authentication in security context. If invalid token found, redirects to login page. If no token found, continues without authentication.
      Specified by:
      filter in interface org.springframework.web.server.WebFilter
      Parameters:
      exchange - the server web exchange containing the request and response
      chain - the web filter chain for continuing request processing
      Returns:
      a Mono that completes when request processing is finished

    • getOrder

      public int getOrder()
      Returns the order value of this filter (high priority).
      Specified by:
      getOrder in interface org.springframework.core.Ordered
      Returns:
      the order value (-1 indicates high priority)
